DOC.brief_summary: This study include cryopreserved sperm infertile azoospermic men , proven diagnosis varicocele ( clinical & sonographic ) , use ICSI ART program Sohag . Patients personal medical history socio-demographic data retrieve saved medical file .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome ICSI Using Cryopreserved Testicular Sperm From Infertile Men With Varicocele-associated Azoospermia
DOC.detailed_description: Study approval : The study submit approval Research Ethical committees Faculty Medicine , Sohag University . This study include cryopreserved sperm infertile azoospermic men , proven diagnosis varicocele ( clinical & sonographic ) , use ICSI ART program Sohag . Patients personal medical history socio-demographic data retrieve saved medical file . Study design : Prospective , control clinical study . Control group : ICSI case use cryopreserved sperm infertile azoospermic men due etiology varicocele . Cases know female factor infertility exclude . Outcome Measures : fertilization rate , embryo quality , chemical pregnancy clinical pregnancy .
